settings.title: Basics of Grow Tents
settings.html:
A grow tent set up begins with these three components. For best results we recommend adding our ‘Air and Humidity kit’ to maximize the potential of your plants. While you can grow cannabis with just a tent kit, most will find the growing conditions won’t maximize your end result.

Our mid level and up grow kits are not the cheapest on the market. They do contain quality components that are proven to last and produce the results you expect. In addition, we provide the support and info you need for a successful grow. Give us a call during business hours for your answers. We have chosen AC Infinity products along side Gro Pros LED lighting because of their superior quality and reasonable price points.

Refer below for more information.

settings.title: Common Challenges
settings.html:
Here is a list of some problems you may run into:

  • Humidity is problematic especially during the flowering stage. Your dense buds will hold moisture creating a ripe place for mold to grow. Not a good thing for your lungs or health of your buds. An exhaust fan can take care of this problem easily.
  • Smell is often a complaint, nuisance or possibly even a legal issue in some situations. This can be taken care of by combining an exhaust fan and a carbon filter. The filter will remove any smell that might be exhausted into your room, garage or outdoor environment that could unsettle your neighbors.
  • A simple fan to move the air inside your tent will help your plants breath. Stagnant air will become humid in spots if the air in the tent isn’t moved around. A circulation fan and an exhaust fan work together to keep the environment in your grow tent at the optimum temperature and humidity level.

Our air and humidity kits are equipped to manage any growing situation inside a grow tent.

VENTILATION IS IMPORTANT

settings.title: AC Infinity CloudLab Grow Tent
settings.description: A grow tent designed to grow plants indoors by providing complete control over climate conditions. Featuring a quick-view observation window, this grow tent uses a waterproof oxford canvas with a 2000D thickness for higher durability and light-proofing. Cross-patterned diamond mylar lines the surface of the inner walls, which will reflect and maximize output from your grow light. To ensure maximum reflectivity and prevent light leaking, an inner ribbon stitching creates a seal that lines the zippers inside the grow tent. Additionally, the duct ports’ double cinching design closes them on either side to reinforce the light-proof sealing. Accessories include a waterproof floor tray, a built-in tool bag, and a mounting plate to install your controller onto the grow tent.An advanced grow tent designed to create optimal climate conditions for year-round plant cultivation indoors.Features durable frame that uses 50% thicker steel poles and carries 2x more weight than standard grow tents.Higher density 2000D canvas prevents light leaks while diamond mylar amplifies light reflectivity.Future ready design featuring controller mounting plate with passthrough for no light-leak cable management.

settings.title: Auto Pilot Timer
settings.description:
Good for lighting, watering or air control. Automating your grow environment frees you up from the daily need to personally attend to these three daily plant needs.
Grounded 1 second on/off
Up to 8 on/off cycles per day
15A/1725W
Good for lighting, watering or air control.

settings.title: 4 Foot Fluorescent Light
settings.description: LuxStar 2 foot 4 bulb and 4 foot 8 bulb T5 Fluorescent light fixtures that are perfect space-saving lights as they have a super low profile! These fixtures also emit significantly less heat than other reflectors so they can be placed closer to the tops of plants, giving them that much more light! The LuxStar T5s use high-efficiency digital ballasts and high-output bulbs to create the most efficient light source. They also features dual power switches so you have the option of dimming the fixture by 50%.

settings.title: Lowest Priced Tent Kit
settings.top-of-page:
Our entry level kit is priced to get you started on a budget. Please read the notes above referencing common challenges when purchasing this kit.
This kit utilizes fluorescent lights. Not the end of the world, just be aware and do some research for your next grow, but you can further maximize your end product with the addition of the right light set up.
Be sure to take note of the timer and light drop down options.

settings.title: Air and Humidity Kits
settings.content: A grow tent kit is a good start. If you want to maximize your grow, we recommend an Air and Humidity Kit.

settings.title: Harvest Kits
settings.content: You spent all this time treating your babies right, don't stop at the bud. Our harvest kits will make sure your hard earned work is treated right.

settings.title: Soil Types and Nutrients
settings.content: Before you decide on your nutes, you need to decide what kind of soil you want to grow in.

settings.title: Seed Starting Kit
settings.content: Give your precious seeds the support they need with a seed starting kit.

settings.title: All Kits
settings.content: These are just two of our kits. Check out the rest with the button below.

settings.title: Grow Pros Solutions LED
settings.description: A full-spectrum LED rack lighting solution designed for commercial indoor and greenhouse applications, enabling control over the plant cycle from the vegetative stage to the flowering stage. Indoor plants grow best under full-spectrum lights, which replicate the natural spectrum of the sun. The HM480 Series, with an increased lifespan over traditional grow light sources, cultivates healthier, happier plants. 7 year warranty. • Compatible with TrolMaster system+Adapter LMA-14• Added one extension bar on each side to cover 4’ x 4’ or 4’ x 5’ grow tray• Come with 120-277V AC output quick access outlet on the fixture• Foldable design, easy installation• Up to 30% more energy saving than traditional HID and HPS• Optimized spectrum proven by growers for veg and flowering• Superior delivered PPF and PAR exceeding 1000W HPS• Scientifically engineered to maximize photosynthesis, growth, and yieldWarranty: 7-year limited

settings.title: Mid Level Kit with LED's
settings.top-of-page:
What sets this kit apart from the others, is the Grow Pros Solutions LED fixtures backed by an unmatched in the industry 7 year warranty. This is a high end lighting fixture chosen by commercial growers.
AC Infinity creates quality tents that are second to no one.
And be sure to add an ‘Air and Humidity kit’ to maximize your plants potential.
For larger grows, don't forget the drop down menu's with different tent and light fixture options.

settings.title: AC Infinity Grow Tent Kits
settings.kit-details: An advance grow system utilizing smart controls with integrated fans and lights to manage your grow environment. The intelligent controller can program each connected equipment to dynamically adjust speed and brightness based on climate and schedules. The next-gen EC inline fan with carbon filter and ducting manages your tent’s climate conditions by routing heat, humidity, and odor away from it. Custom air circulation ranging from gentle breezes for seedlings to a powerful airflow for flowering can be provided by the cutting-edge EC clip fan. The grow light features an unibody aluminum build, full-spectrum Samsung LM301B LEDs, and algorithmic diode positioning to maximize plant yields. These devices are housed in a premium grow tent, containing the thickest steel frames and 2000D mylar canvas to create a climate-controlled grow space.
